message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss selling this product to you.  I think it could really benefit your business.  To kick things off, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,900,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,400,000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the market value, but my price reflects the unique value and benefits this product offers, some of which might not be immediately apparent in the general market. To move us closer, I'm willing to come down to $1,750,000.  I believe this price point represents a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,600,000. Can we discuss further?
